00079 /** 
00080  * \ingroup PrivateLibrary
00081  * \brief Global variable for initialization state of the library.
00082  *
00083  * \description
00084  *
00085  *   1 = initialized, 0 = not initialized.
00086  */
00087 static int library_init = 0;
00088 
00089 
00090 
00091 /** 
00092  * \ingroup PrivateLibrary
00093  * \brief Global variable for counting error, warning, log, and debug messages
00094  *
00095  *  
00096  */
00097 FC_LogCount _fc_log_count = {0,0,0,0};
00098 
00099 /** \name Obtain the number of error, warning, log, and debug messages that were posted. */
00100 //-------------------------------
00101 //@{
00102 
00103 /** 
00104  * \ingroup Library
00105  * \brief Obtain the number of error, warning, log, and debug messages that were posted. 
00106  *
00107  * \description
00108  * 
00109  *    This function prints out info about how many error, warning, log, and debug messages
00110  *    were posted. The user can provide a verbosity setting to prevent
00111  *
00112  * \modifications
00113  *    - 2/20/2008 CDU Created
00114  */
00115 void fc_printLogCounters(FC_VerbosityLevel minLevel){
00116   if( ((minLevel >= FC_ERROR_MESSAGES)   && (_fc_log_count.errors))   ||
00117       ((minLevel >= FC_WARNING_MESSAGES) && (_fc_log_count.warnings)) ||
00118       ((minLevel >= FC_LOG_MESSAGES)     && (_fc_log_count.logs))     ||
00119       ((minLevel >= FC_DEBUG_MESSAGES)   && (_fc_log_count.debugs))      )
00120     fprintf(stderr," FCLib Message Summary: %d Errors, %d Warnings, %d Logs, %d Debugs\n",
00121          _fc_log_count.errors,_fc_log_count.warnings,_fc_log_count.logs,_fc_log_count.debugs);
00122 }
00123

00125 /**
00126  * \ingroup PrivateLibrary
00127  * \brief  Global variable for Verbosity level of the library.    
00128  */
00129 static FC_VerbosityLevel library_verbosity = FC_QUIET;
00130 
00131 /** \name Set and query the library verbosity level. */
00132 //-------------------------------
00133 //@{
00134 
00135 /** 
00136  * \ingroup Library
00137  * \brief Set the library verbosity level.
00138  *
00139  * \description
00140  * 
00141  *    See \ref FC_VerbosityLevel for explanation of possible settings.
00142  *
00143  * \modifications
00144  *    - 3/12/04 RM created.
00145  */
00146 FC_ReturnCode fc_setLibraryVerbosity( 
00147  FC_VerbosityLevel verbosity   /**< input - desire verbosity */
00148 )
00149 {
00150   int flag;
00151 
00152   // test args
00153   flag = fc_isVerbosityLevelValid(verbosity);
00154   if (flag < 1) {
00155     fc_printfWarningMessage("Invalid verbosity level (%d)", verbosity);
00156     return FC_INPUT_ERROR;
00157   }
00158 
00159   // do it
00160   fc_printfLogMessage("Setting library verbosity to %s",
00161                 fc_getVerbosityLevelText(verbosity)); 
00162   library_verbosity = verbosity;
00163 
00164   return FC_SUCCESS;
00165 }
00166 
00167 /** 
00168  * \ingroup Library
00169  * \brief Get the current verbosity level of the library.
00170  *
00171  * \description
00172  * 
00173  *    See \ref FC_VerbosityLevel for explanation of possible settings.
00174  *
00175  * \modifications
00176  *   -  3/12/04 RM created.
00177  */
00178 FC_VerbosityLevel fc_getLibraryVerbosity(void) 
00179 {
00180   return  library_verbosity;
00181 }
00182 
00183 //@}
00184  
00185 /** \name Initialize/finalize the library. */
00186 //-------------------------------
00187 //@{
00188 
00189 /**
00190  * \ingroup  Library
00191  * \brief  Setup Feature Characterization Library for use.
00192  *
00193  * \description  
00194  *
00195  *    Executes library initialization.  Must be called before using any
00196  *    functions except for fc_getLibraryVerbosity and fc_setLibraryVerbosity
00197  *    (\ref fc_setLibraryVerbosity should be called before \ref
00198  *    fc_initLibrary() if you want any to insure that anything setup by the
00199  *    library (e.g.  the SAF i/o libraries) are initialized with your requested
00200  *    verbosity level).
00201  *
00202  *    Calling fc_initLibrary() more than once is an error.
00203  *
00204  * \modifications  
00205  *    - Nancy Collins, Created.
00206  *    - 06/03/04 WSK, modified to insure that library cannot be reinited.
00207  */
00208 FC_ReturnCode fc_initLibrary(void) 
00209 {
00210   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00211   static int been_here = 0;
00212   
00213   // reiniting library is an error
00214   if (been_here) {
00215     if (library_init) {
00216       fc_printfErrorMessage("Library already initialized");
00217     }
00218     else 
00219       fc_printfErrorMessage("Library cannot be reinitialized once finalized");
00220     return FC_ERROR;
00221   }
00222 
00223   // init the library
00224   fc_printfLogMessage("Initializing FC Library");
00225 
00226   // init IO
00227   rc = _fc_initFileIO();
00228   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) {
00229     fc_printfErrorMessage("Failed to initialize File IO");
00230     return rc;
00231   }
00232   
00233   library_init = 1;
00234   been_here = 1;
00235 
00236   return FC_SUCCESS;
00237 }
00238 
00239 /**
00240  * \ingroup  Library
00241  * \brief   Cleanup when done using Feature Characterization Library.
00242  *
00243  * \description
00244  *  
00245  *    Executes library finalization.  Should be called after
00246  *    last access to library. Will delete all datasets.
00247  *
00248  *    It is not an error to final an uninitialized library, but you
00249  *    can not reinitialize a finalized library.
00250  *
00251  * \modifications  
00252  *    - Nancy Collins, Created.
00253  *    - 12/08/03 WSK Made sure it deletes databases and frees
00254  *            all of the tables.
00255  */
00256 FC_ReturnCode fc_finalLibrary( 
00257  void
00258 ) {
00259   int i;
00260   FC_ReturnCode rc, rc_keep;
00261   _FC_DsSlot* dsSlot;
00262   FC_Dataset dataset;
00263   char* temp_name;
00264 
00265   // finalizing uninitialized library does not generate an error
00266   if (library_init == 0) {
00267     fc_printfWarningMessage("Library already finalized");
00268     return FC_SUCCESS;
00269   }
00270   
00271   // log message
00272   fc_printfLogMessage("Finalizing FC Library");
00273 
00274   // delete all datasets
00275   rc_keep = FC_SUCCESS;
00276   for (i = 0; i < _fc_getDsTableSize(); i++) {
00277     dsSlot = _fc_getDsSlotFromID(i);
00278     if (dsSlot) {
00279       _FC_GET_HANDLE(dataset, dsSlot);
00280       fc_getDatasetName(dataset, &temp_name);
00281       rc = fc_deleteDataset(dataset);
00282       if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) {
00283         rc_keep = rc;
00284         fc_printfWarningMessage("Failed to delete dataset '%s'", temp_name);
00285       }
00286       free(temp_name);
00287     }
00288   }
00289 
00290   // free tables
00291   _fc_freeDsTable();
00292   _fc_freeSeqTable();
00293   _fc_freeMeshTable();
00294   _fc_freeSubTable();
00295   _fc_freeVarTable();
00296 
00297   // finalize file IO
00298   rc = _fc_finalFileIO();
00299   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) 
00300     fc_printfWarningMessage("Failed to finalize FileIO");
00301   
00302 
00303   // library is considered finalized even if error generated
00304   library_init = 0;
00305 
00306   // if any errors, make sure you return one of them
00307   if (rc == FC_SUCCESS)
00308     return rc_keep;
00309   else
00310     return rc;
00311 }
00312 
00313 //@}
00314 
00315 /**
00316  * \ingroup  PrivateLibrary
00317  * \brief  Check initialization state of library.
00318  *
00319  * \description
00320  *  
00321  *    Returns true (1) is library is available for use.
00322  *
00323  * \modifications  
00324  *   - 05/20/04  W Koegler  Created.
00325  */
00326 int _fc_isLibraryInit(void) 
00327 {
00328   return library_init;
00329 }
